description.en: Quest Item: A scroll with the stamp of a hero. Needed for the test in the Altar of Hero.
description.ar: Quest Item: A scroll with the stamp of a hero. Needed for the test in the Altar of Hero.
description.br: (Quest) Um pergaminho com o selo de um herói. Necessário para o teste no Altar do Herói.
description.cns: 印有英雄印章的卷轴。有了它才能去祭坛进行训练
description.de: (Questitem) Eine Schriftrolle mit einem Stempel des Helden. Sie wird benötigt um den Test im Altar des Helden anzunehmen.
description.fi: Quest Item: A scroll with the stamp of a hero. Needed for the test in the Altar of Hero.
description.fil: Quest Item: A scroll with the stamp of a hero. Needed for the test in the Altar of Hero.
description.fr: Un parchemin portant l'empreinte des Héros, nécessaire au passage du test de l'Autel des Héros.
description.id: Item Quest: Gulungan dengan cap pahlawan. Dibutuhkan untuk ujian di Altar of Hero.
description.it: Quest Item: A scroll with the stamp of a hero. Needed for the test in the Altar of Hero.
description.jp: 英雄の印章が押されており、英雄の祭壇でテストを行うことが出来る。（クエストアイテム）
description.kr: 영웅의 인장이 찍혀있으며 영웅의 제단에서 시험을 볼 수 있다.
description.nl: Quest Item: A scroll with the stamp of a hero. Needed for the test in the Altar of Hero.
description.pl: Quest Item: A scroll with the stamp of a hero. Needed for the test in the Altar of Hero.
description.ru: Ключевой предмет: свиток с печатью героя. Нужен для испытания у Алтаря героя.
description.sp: Objeto de Misión: Un pergamino con el sello de un héroe. Necesario para la prueba en el Altar del Héroe.
description.sw: Quest Item: A scroll with the stamp of a hero. Needed for the test in the Altar of Hero.
description.th: Quest Item: ม้วนกระดาษที่มีตราประทับของฮีโร่ จำเป็นสำหรับการทดสอบในแท่นบูชาของฮีโร่
description.tw: [任務道具]印有英雄印章的卷軸。需要帶著它去英雄祭壇進行測試。
description.vi: Vật phẩm nhiệm vụ: Một cuộn có dấu của một anh hùng. Cần thiết cho bài kiểm tra trong Altar of Hero.
